title: Betanin dye extracted from ayrampo (Opuntia soehrensii) seeds to develop dye-sensitized solar cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9913-9919
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08010B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Heather V. Flint, Harry Anderson Rivera Tito, Richard D. James, Fabio Cucinotta, Elizabeth Gibson, María Esther Quintana Caceda
Pigments extracted from ayrampo seeds of the Peruvian-native cactus (Opuntia soehrensii) were used in dye-sensitized solar cells with promising efficiencies.
